title: Fiora next patch?
body: Will Fiora be released in patch 5.15? can anyone confirm?

replies.body: Will she be getting a skin to go along with her release? :D

Yes. 

Royal Guard Fiora, Nightraven Fiora, and Headmistress Fiora.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2qRu95Vo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-31T04:42:10.509+0000)
>
> That's the plan.

Is more work going to be done on her in the meanwhile? It seems like after the hair change on the main skin there seemed to be some disinterest in doing much further from what I have been following.
... are you not planning to kill another character, aren' t you?

I hope she gets a skin with her new rework release. That would be awesome!

She hasn't gotten a new one in years.
A Jedi skin would be amazing like when ult procs it's the Jedi Symbol.
Yes,it should be out in 5.15.Which should be out sometime next week,either Wednesday or Thursday.
